Room.Name: Highland Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Highland Avenue, east of the Crimson Dragon Inn.
Room.LongDescription: The elegant Crimson Dragon Traveler's Lodge is one of the more popular inns in the city. Of course, being as elegant and well-kept as it is, the Lodge tends to cost quite a bit to stay in for just a couple of nights. There are stables to the south where you can leave horses while visiting Oceancrest.
